keyword: how many calories are in a mcchicken
title: How Many Calories Are in a McChicken?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a McChicken from McDonald's, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a McChicken?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's McChicken: crispy chicken patty, shredded lettuce, mayonnaise on a sesame seed bun; no customizations or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and customizations. Check McDonald's app or website for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A standard McChicken sandwich contains about 410 calories and 14 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add one slice of American cheese

faqs.q: How many calories are in a McChicken?
faqs.a: A standard McChicken has about 410 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a McChicken?
faqs.a: Approximately 40 g carbs, 14 g protein, and 22 g total fat.

faqs.q: Is the McChicken high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, one sandwich contains about 600 mg of sodium.

faqs.q: How does removing the bun affect calories in a McChicken?
faqs.a: It reduces calories by around 170, bringing the total to about 240 kcal.

faqs.q: Does the McChicken have trans fat?
faqs.a: A small amount, about 0.1 g per sandwich.
